entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.40
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove subquery for companies.account_id column
  • v5.10.40 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10149

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.39...v5.10.40

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.41
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for expense imports
  • Working on Payment Means for CII
  • Fixes for smtp_port cast
  • Fixes for parallel tests
  • Update client balance after merge
  • Add amount filters for expense
  • Additional logging for license keys
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10157
  • Websockets: New notifications by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10154
  • v5.10.41 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.40...v5.10.41

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.42
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for credit sent events by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10162
  • v5.10.42 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10167

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.41...v5.10.42

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.43
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for regression for PDF generation with Projects
  • EInvoicing: PEPPOL setup for hosted by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10113
  • Support ids on sidebars by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10169
  • Peppol by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10170
  • Bump Simple Card to 0.0.5 by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10176
  • Additional test cases for task time logs by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10177
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10178
  • Updates for PEPPOL properties by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10174
  • v5.10.43 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.42...v5.10.43
